allow: Bash(xargs -I {} sh -c 'cat ""{}"" 2>/dev/null | python3 -c ""import sys,json; d=json.load\(sys.stdin\); defects=d.get\(\\""defects\\"",[]\); print\([x.get\(\\""name\\""\) for x in defects]\) if defects else None""')

Bash(do python3 -c " import json, sys try: with open\(''$f'', ''r''\) as fp: d = json.load\(fp\) is_normal = d.get\(''image_info'', {}\).get\(''is_normal'', True\) defects = d.get\(''defects'', []\) if is_normal: print\(''normal''\) elif defects: for defect in defects: print\(defect.get\(''name'', ''unknown''\)\) else: print\(''defect_no_type''\) except: pass ")
